thread.title: Muni Bonds May Not Be the Reliable Bet They Once Were

author: John Coumarianos
title: Muni Bonds May Not Be the Reliable Bet They Once Were
text:
Can investors still use municipal-bond funds as core holdings in their taxable accounts?
For a long time, many have done just that—taking advantage of the bonds’ big tax benefits, and using their low risk as a haven in times of stock-market turmoil.
But munis aren’t looking like such a reliable bet anymore. Since the financial crisis, some...
